question: Is it islamically allowed to work for this company? company does advertising for international music groups...I would be assisting the company users with their computer related queries
answer:
QUESTION
I have a job offer to work in an advertising company. The company however does advertising for international music groups. The position offered to me is not involved in any way with the promoting of these singers but rather in IT. I would be assisting the company users with their computer related queries. I am hesitant to take the job but believe that careerwise it would be beneficial . Your advise would be greatly appreciated .
ANSWER


Share:
Music is prohibited. Your employment in the IT department of the advertising company will require you to assist their music advertising clients in their computer related queries. That will also be promoting the music industry.

Allah Ta?ala says, ?And do not assist in sin.? (Maaidah). It is not permissible for you to accept employment in the IT department of advertising company.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
